title: I.Sicily inscription 000218
support: Fazellus lists this as one of a number of ancient marble tablets to be found in private houses in Termini

layout.p: Three lines of Latin letters, if Fazellus' layout is reliable

date._: Presumably of imperial date, 1st — 3rd century CE

provenanceFound._: The text is reported in Fazellus' De Rebus Siculis (1558) as being in a private house in Termini ('In domo Garfofali'); it was already either unfindable or illegible ('litera abolita') by the time of Gualtherus (1624)
